rules_text:
Enchant land
When International Development enters, make a pledge. [i](Create any green Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)[/i]
Enchanted land has “{T}: Add two mana of different colors.”
notes:
Art Validated
!addtoken Sillaman Laboratories;1;Penrath Insurgency;1;Vishanki Inc.;1
